Ask any New Yorker why they go to the mat
and the answers are as vast
as the museum itself.

Some go to find inspiration
or to make the most of living in the city.

Others go for a date night
or to catch up with a friend.

Some wander the galleries
to connect with the past, while others

go for just a quiet moment
with their favorite artwork.

Whatever brings you to the mat,
there's something for everyone.
Learn more at Met Museum dot org.
